title: []time.Time should implement sort.Interface
body:
by **unit0x03**: 
In general, I think that standard library datatypes with well defined orderings should
implement the sort.Interface so they can be easily sorted.

In specific, I think that the required functions should be added to the time package so
that []time.Time can be easily sorted, since time.Time objects have an intrinsic and
well understood ordering.
